I keep telling myself...... Breath...... breath slow.

Posts.Content: Oct 31, 2016 10:57AM quiltspice wrote: I'm new to this forum and will probably have my bmx in Nov (Plastics consultation is Nov 2)..... but it's encouraging to hear that 4 days post surgery you are feeling better. I am so not looking forward to this!!!! :( I had my breast biopsy Sept 28th (it's small, ER+PR+HER2-). Today I went to Walmart and picked up a few things from the "what to bring to the hospital" list. So thankful for that list- I just would not have known what to pack!!!!
